programme.title: Her Wiles
programme.desc: Despite numerous warnings from Ritas aunt, Rita becomes pregnant by Kelly, a notorious playboy. Now, she must face the consequences.

programme.title: Why Women Kill
programme.desc: Madam B sells her daughter out as a fourth wife because of her love for money. Now, she must make up for all her wrong as she decides to turn a new leaf.

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: Roland is blinded for his hatred for women that he did not really see that Chinny is perfect for him until he lost her after getting her pregnant the second time.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Ezeugo consults the Ezenmuo. Akuada reveals the reason for her actions.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A council meeting is held to sieve out the spies. Ahunna is impatient for what is hers, and Nwoye prepares to leave.

programme.title: Imperfect Match
programme.desc: Chizaras dreams of pursuing education clash with her parents pressure to marry. Enduring numerous heartbreaks due to impulsive choices, her life takes a turn when she meets Richard,

programme.title: Love Or Law
programme.desc: Caught in the web of a notorious criminals world, Benny, tasked with bringing him down, finds herself unexpectedly pregnant and deeply in love with him.

programme.title: Deadly Romance
programme.desc: KC plans with Nikky so she falls in love with Charles, gets married to him and divorce him just to share his wealth. Unknowingly, Charles comes up with a different plan.

programme.title: My One And Only
programme.desc: Poor Nzube trained Ifesinachi through school and is ready to marry her, but the pressure from her mother is about to crumble everything if Nzube does not take drastic action.

programme.title: 3 Sisters
programme.desc: After Afam and his three sisters lost their parents, he falls in love with Harriet who separate him from his sisters. Things are about to change as Hariet is exposed.

programme.title: Mmuo Na Mmadu
programme.desc: Three princesses die carrying a warning for their people, but as spirits bound to protect the living, they must sacrifice love, or risk another kingdoms destruction.

programme.title: To Love A Cripple
programme.desc: When Collins falls in love with Blessing, his mother becomes so enraged, she injures Blessing and leaves her disabled. Will Collins learn the truth and help Blessing?

programme.title: Wedding Ring
programme.desc: Zara and Benjamins best could not stand seeing them together as husband and wife, so he did the unimaginable.

programme.title: Akunna
programme.desc: Agidi and Oforie have a great bond as friend built on love, trust and care, but on the other side of the story, the wife of Oforie has a secret to keep.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nwoye leaves Mgberi, Adanna and Nnanna face a surprising new revelation.

programme.title: My Servant
programme.desc: All the princesses in a palace wants the cook Benji, for keeps, but all hell break loose when the king finds out that he has gotten his three daughters pregnant.

programme.title: Secret Of A Queen
programme.desc: After the sacrifice, a virgin is held back and not return to her kingdom. It is revealed that she can not marry another man after carrying the pot of sacrifice. Will the kingdom be ok?

programme.title: Hot Box Of Chocolate
programme.desc: A graduate who could not find a job eventually gets a job working as a house help with a family, but she is not love by all. She eventually gets her dreams come through.

programme.title: The Cook
programme.desc: Lawson falls in love with Zimchi, this angered the four other ladies in Lawsons life. Now that he has decided to marry, but it can no longer work because of Zimchis mother.

programme.title: Innocence Between Walls
programme.desc: Dimitri is about to let out all secrets as Mrs. Elizabeth is killed in her apartment and all fingers points to Abigail, Mrs. Elizabeth daughter.

programme.title: Beyond The Brink

programme.title: The Hidden Enforcers
programme.desc: A retired police officer trains four assassins to punish wrongdoers who escaped from conviction. However, his good intention turns sour when the assassins kill the cops.

programme.title: Butterfly Lovers
programme.desc: Loosely based on the Butterfly Lovers legend, this is the tragic love story between Zhu Yan Zhi and her martial arts senior, Liang Zhong Shan, in the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Most Wanted
programme.desc: A botched police raid leads to a suspected betrayal of an undercover cop. As he is put on the most wanted list by both police and the triad, can he prove his innocence?

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily. A talented virtual car racing champion joins them to regain its glory.

programme.title: Rosa
programme.desc: Two bumbling cops must retrieve a roll of film containing the criminal evidence against a drug cartel from the informants girlfriend, Rosa, to track down the gangsters.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: When long-lost twins, famous pianist John and criminal Boomer, reunite in Hong Kong and accidentally swap lives, Boomer vows to save John from the clutches of gangsters.

programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a housewife living with her husband and daughter. When a stranger uses her dark history to blackmail her, Mrs K is forced to face an old enemy to save her family.

programme.title: Wild Search
programme.desc: In a gun trafficking raid, a police officer finds the little girl who witnessed her mothers murder by the ruthless gunrunners, and must protect her from being killed.

programme.title: The Iron Fisted Monk
programme.desc: After learning kung fu from Shaolin, Husker teams up with the Iron Fisted Monk to fight against the Manchus who have killed villagers and raped women.

programme.title: The Avenging Fist
programme.desc: A young man uses martial arts skill founded by his father, and the Power Glove, a tool that unleashes mind power, to battle rebels intending to dominate the world.

programme.title: Helios
programme.desc: When the notorious criminal, Helios steals a powerful weapon from South Korea and attempts to sell it in Hong Kong, the police forces of these two lands must join hands.

programme.title: The Heroic Trio
programme.desc: Newborn babies destined to be emperors are kidnapped by the Evil Master. The police are powerless, so the city must be saved by three women with superb fighting skills.

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong in 1917. When the whole school is held hostage during the day of an English speech competition, Ip Man decides to step up...

programme.title: 3AM The Driver
programme.desc: A taxi driver judges people and sets out to help victims in his own way. When trying to help the woman he likes, he turns into a cold-blooded serial killer instead.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: At the dawn of 1997, three notorious Hong Kong thieves coincidentally meet in a restaurant, sparking rumours of a huge heist before the Handover unbeknownst to them.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Madam Fong leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the HK Deputy Commissioner of Police.

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of police officers uncovers their seniors involvement in an illegal plot after a drug operation raid. They vow to bring them to justice and root out corruption.

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: While con man Bo and femme fatale Li swindle their way across China, Li suddenly decides to leave Bo. However, their encounter with Fu Gen changes their fate forever.

programme.title: Seven Warriors
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Guangxi, a group of villagers threatened by bandits hires seven warriors to stop the bandits tyranny, and team up to defeat the bandits in the end.

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: An underground boxer loses his memory while escaping from the Bangkok triad. When he regains his memory after starting anew, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: In the Line of Duty III
programme.desc: Two notorious thieves escape to Hong Kong after committing a jewellery heist in Japan. Madam Yeung and a Japanese inspector must team up to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit must win a fight to get his boxing studio back but is defeated and badly hurt instead. Will he win again after witnessing the boxers spirit in his master?

programme.title: Righting Wrongs
programme.desc: When an important witness and his family are brutally murdered, a furious and disillusioned lawyer decides to dish out his own vigilante justice with his fist.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: The film pays tribute to generations of stuntmen, including current super stars, who designed and delivered some of the most spectacular death-defying kung fu moves on-screen.

programme.title: Once A Gangster
programme.desc: Two former gangsters are tapped to run in an election for leader of the triad gang, but both want to preserve their peaceful lives. Each must outwit the other to lose.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: Guan Yu is held hostage by Cao, the enemy of his sworn brother Liu, and must fight for Cao. He has to fight a dangerous battle before he can rescue Lius concubine from Cao.

programme.title: Black Cat
programme.desc: A tough and rebellious girl is recruited by the CIA and trained to be a deadly assassin. Her life changes when she gets to know about real life from killing.

programme.title: Clean My Name, Mr Coroner
programme.desc: An undercover cop framed for murder is forced to take a coroner hostage so as to prove his innocence in the murder of his partner.

programme.title: Life Without Principle
programme.desc: A criminal, a bank officer and a cop are forced to abandon their morals and principles to solve their financial problems.

programme.title: My Heart is That Eternal Rose
programme.desc: A professional killer reunites with his ex-lover who has become the mistress of a kingpin, leading them into extreme danger.

programme.title: Mr Vampire

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson and Jason Statham drive this epic spin-off to the Fast franchise. They team up to stop a fierce Idris Elba, who plays a mercenary with a deadly virus.

programme.title: Wrath Of Man
programme.desc: Guy Ritchie and Jason Statham team up again to deliver this gritty action film. A mysterious and fierce new cash truck security guard has a hidden vengeful agenda.

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: Expect carnage, explosions, gunfights, and car chases in this intense star-studded thriller. A shady art dealer crosses paths with a mob over a stolen iconic painting.

programme.title: Perfectly Single
programme.desc: A conservative and socially awkward optometrist takes a leap of faith with a young suitor. Soon, her journey leads her down a path to self-discovery.

programme.title: Twisted Vines
programme.desc: A murder mystery that will keep you guessing. A wedding at a vineyard estate turns deadly when a body is discovered, and all the guests turn into suspects.

programme.title: Shamed
programme.desc: A delightful romcom. A magazine editor goes on an island trip to clear her mind and focus on her infamous Shamed List column, only to fall for one of the men on her List.

programme.title: Mosley
programme.desc: An enchanting family animation. Mosley rebels from a life of servitude to uncover the origins of his species after learning that his fellow thoriphants used to stand upright.

programme.title: How The Grinch Stole Christmas
programme.desc: Dr. Seuss How The Grinch Stole Christmas. Jim Carrey plays the infamous Grinch, a creature who hates Christmas and plots to steal it.

programme.title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty By Nature
programme.desc: A silly adventure ensues for Surly the squirrel in this fun sequel. When the mayor of Oakton City plots to destroy their home, Surly and his friends must do all they can to stop him.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: The Courier
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Benedict Cumberbatch leads this high-stakes Cold War spy thriller. A British businessman joins forces with a Soviet officer to defuse the Cuban Missile Crisis.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: A nail-biting survival thriller. After climbing an abandoned 2000-foot radio tower, best friends Becky and Hunter find themselves trapped at the top with no way down.

programme.title: Fortress 2: Snipers Eye
programme.desc: The sequel to the action cyber thriller Fortress. Weeks after the deadly assault on Fortress Camp, Robert (Bruce Willis) makes a daring rescue to save the widow of his old nemesis.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 9
programme.desc: Having escaped the clutches of Charlize Theron, Dom and the crew are now faced with the emergence of his estranged brother, played by John Cena, in this exciting ninth instalment.

programme.title: Spiral From The Book Of Saw
programme.desc: This Saw spin-off adds a new twist while keeping the franchises brutality. Detective Zeke Banks (Chris Rock) tries to track down a Jigsaw copycat killer who targets cops.

programme.title: The Goldfinch
programme.desc: A book-inspired drama about a young boy who lost his mother in a terrorist attack. He has a coveted painting stolen before the tragedy as a memento of his mothers death.

programme.title: Blinding Lights
programme.desc: A young aspiring female singer struggling with addiction wants to make it big in the Atlanta music scene. She decides to overcome the strikes she has against her family.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: All Saints Christmas
programme.desc: A delightful holiday movie. When a popular RandB singers picture of her and her ex is misinterpreted as an engagement, her family insists he joins her on her trip back home.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now...
programme.sub-title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.

programme.title: The Nutcracker And The Magic Flute
programme.desc: The classic Nutcracker tale gets a refreshing twist. As Marie wishes to escape her troubles, she shrinks to the size of her toys, which all come to life.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: When the murderous Lord Shen threatens China with a terrifying new weapon, Po must face a truth he never expected and defeat Shen for the good of Kung Fu.
